description.default: Determines if you want to only update objects that have changed, or all objects. Defaults to No. Switching to Yes will cause the flows to inventory every single app/flow/etc in the tenant and make the flows long running

label.description: Determines if you want to only update objects that have changed, or all objects. Defaults to No. Switching to Yes will cause the flows to inventory every single app/flow/etc in the tenant and make the flows long running
